Reviews.Content: arrived knock door cafe downstairs attract attention person sweeping internet tv dusty woken frequently throughout night windows insulation sound passing revellers cars bikes etc cafe 830am late breakfast appointments cursory proper reception ambivalent lack tv overall fairly rubbish

Reviews.Title: “Upmarket, boutique hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: John L Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: booking friendly enthusiastic receptionist shown loft minimalistic style bathroom bedroom tastefully decorated cleaned standards suggestion teacoffee facilities boutique restaurant below hotel hotel situated quiet shopping street upmarket designer stores located approximately 25 mins leisurely walk amsterdam central train stationwe found perfect location hesitation recommending hotel staying amsterdam
